Texts.Chs:
允许把飞船用液态和晶体燃料通过这个面板灌注到燃料仓中给FTL引擎提供能源
^#B8860B;可在飞船用家具定制台调整种族风格^reset;
Texts.Eng: Accepts Liquid Erchius as fuel for the ship's FTL dive.

Texts.Chs: 给FTL引擎供能的燃料仓，叶族人可以用燃料灌灌灌灌灌满它
Texts.Eng: Fuel hatch for FTL drive. Let'ss fill it up!

Texts.Chs: FTL引擎的燃料仓，在这里灌满燃料我就能在宇宙中自由航行了.
Texts.Eng: The FTL drive fuel hatch. Converts fuel into freedom.

Texts.Chs: 飞船的燃料仓，让我们给它加满燃料让飞船跃迁到未知的星系去吧！
Texts.Eng: The FTL fuel hatch. Let's load it up and take to the stars!

Texts.Chs: FTL引擎的燃料仓，谨记燃料是探险活动的命脉.
Texts.Eng: The humble FTL fuel hatch. Fuel is the lifeblood of exploration.

Texts.Chs: 飞船的燃料仓，有了燃料我们就能跃迁到其他星系.
Texts.Eng: The ship's fuel hatch. With fuel for the FTL drive I can explore outside this system.

Texts.Chs: 愉悦。这是FTL引擎的燃料仓，只要给它加满燃料我就可以访问这个天体系统之外的星系了
Texts.Eng: This hatch fuels the FTL drive so that I may visit planets outside of this system.
